content: **displayed colourways ** blue cardigan 3-colours - a 9959 indigo blue 4 4 5 5 6 - b 0051 white 1 1 2 2 2 - c 9958 light indigo 1 1 1 1 1 grey cardigan 2-colours - a 0054 ash heather 4 4 5 5 6 - b 0005 black heather 1 1 2 2 2 **required materials ** - 6 mm us 10 circular needles 40 and 60-80 cm long - 4½ mm us 7 circular needles 40 cm long - 6 mm us 10 double pointed needles - zip open ended 50-55 cm measure when cardigan is finished **notes ** body and sleeves are worked in the round from lower edge to underarm body and sleeves are then joined and yoke is worked in the round over entire cardigan pattern and decreases are worked from chart round begins and ends with a purl stitch at front of body the front opening is cut open **chart included ** for yoke pattern in both colourways
